subject: UNITED NATIIONS-UNITED ARAB
body:
UNITED NATIIONS-UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
Resident Coordinator Office in UAE
Abu Dhabi Trade Towers,
Abu Dhabi Mall, West Tower,
5th Floor Abu Dhabi,
United Arab Emirates
Tel.+971589770570
Attention Beneficiary
The United Nations worldwide after due consultation with the executives of the World Bank it was considered necessary to compensate all the scam victims around world ,The beneficiaries of the said compensation are for those who have been scammed on the internet which led to the lost of their properties and some were rendered bankruptcy and as a result of many died due to shock after losing their hard earned money to total strangers
However if you have been scammed or any of your loved ones late/alive were scammed congratulation because your family will rejoice again,The sum
sum of 5,000,000,000 usd has been set aside to compensate all the scam victims around the globe ,Therefore each beneficiary is entitled to the sum of 2,500, 000 u.s dollars Million each and your names are found on the compensation payment list that is why we have contacted you so you can start a new life again.
Meanwhile please note that we have contacted you severally to ensure
you claims your fund inheritance but you never responded, Therefore after 24 hours and you do not respond to us we will assume that you are dead and no next of kin from your family then will your payment file be terminated and return back to the federal reserve account as an unclaimed fund.
You have been advised to get back to us as quickly as possible with the following details of yours below if this message finds you in good health.
1) Your Full Names
2) Your Age
3) Your Occupation
4) Your House Address
5) Your cell phone number
6) A scanned copy of your international passport or driving license
Please note as soon as we receive this required information we shall immediately process the release of your compensation fund.
Regards
Ambassador Lana Zaki Nusseibeh
United Nations Representatives in Dubai

subject: Re:   UNITED NATIIONS-UNITED ARAB
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite surprising to hear about this compensation scheme. I must say, it's a very generous initiative by the United Nations and the World Bank.

I'm curious though, how did my name end up on the payment list? I don't recall being scammed or losing any property. Could there be a mix-up somewhere?

Also, could you please explain more about how this compensation process works? How will the funds be transferred and are there any fees involved?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Josephine

subject: MORE DETAILS
body:
UNITED NATIIONS-UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
Resident Coordinator Office in UAE
Abu Dhabi Trade Towers,
Abu Dhabi Mall, West Tower,
5th Floor Abu Dhabi,
United Arab Emirates


Attention Dear

The United Nations worldwide .has acknowledged the receipt of your mail,
Firstly we want you to know that the ongoing compensation scheme was
initiated  by the United Nations with the help of the World Bank in the
2021 immediately after the end of  Covid19 Pandemic that broke out in 2020
which claimed so many innocent souls including Children around the world,

However the Humanitarian Department of the United Nations decided to take
it upon themselves by engaging the management of the World Bank  to
compensate all the victims of the Covid19 Pandemic and as well all the
internet scam victims so that they can start up a new life instead of
commiting suicide as a resul of frustration, The United Nations started
releasing the compensation fund to the beneficiaries sincve 2021 ,We had
contacted you several times but no response from you,

Meanwhile if you had never been scammed in any form and you didn't lose any
of your loved ones to Covid19 Pandemic  including family members and close
friends which left a big hole in your heart then you should also be
thanking God that you have been chosen to benefit from the ongoing
compensation scheme because it's a golden opportunity brought to you by God
due to in as much as your names are found in our payment list we will
release your fund to you, This process is 100% risk free because we have
all the legal documentation backing the fund up legitimately and all the
legal documents shall be sent across to you as soon as your fund released
but if you do not need the fund no problem we will terminate your
compensation payment file and return it back to the federal reserve account
as an unclaimed fund.

We have two options of getting the fund across to the beneficiaries below.
1)  We can delegate a delivery agent with a diplomatic Immunity to bring
the fund in cash down to your home address.

2) We can credit your fund into an international swift card also known as
ATM card whereby the ATM card will be dispensing the sum of $50,000 as the
daily limit until the fund finishes from the card.

All we require from you to enable us process the release of your
compensation payment is just for you to kindly reconfirm the following
information of yours below.

1) Your Full Names
2) Your Age
3) Your Occupation
4) Your House Address
5) Your cell phone number
6) A scanned copy of your international passport or driving license
Regards

Ambassador Lana Zaki Nusseibeh
United Nations Representatives in Dubai

subject: Re: MORE DETAILS
body:
Hello Ambassador Lana Zaki Nusseibeh,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really touched by the efforts of the United Nations and World Bank to help victims of the pandemic and internet scams. It's truly a noble cause.

I must admit, I'm a bit confused about how my name ended up on your payment list. Could you please explain more about this process? How were the beneficiaries chosen?

Also, could you provide more details about these two options for receiving funds? The idea of a delivery agent bringing cash to my home sounds quite unusual. And how does an ATM card work in this context?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josephine

subject: Re: MORE DETAILS
body:
Dear Josephine

Your name names appeared on the list because the United Nations has agents
and representatives in every country and cities  around the world and they
go about picking beneficiaries randomly,I think you should  count yourself
lucky and highly favored .by God

The ATM card  containing the sum of $2.5 Million and it will be dispatched
to your home address alongside with all the legal documents in a parcel
through DHL,Like i said in my previous mail that the ATM card will be able
to dispense $50,000 as the daily limit of the card until all the fund in
the card is withdrawn from the card.

CASH DELIVERY, We have delivery agent who has a diplomatic Immunity issued
to him by the United Nations that empowers him to delivery cash anywhere in
the world without being stopped or checkmate by any security agent until he
delivers to the receiver,

So you can make your choice from the two options and let us know.Please
note that i am a very busy person ,I have people waiting for me to attend
to them in my office,You have been advised to reconfirm the information so
we can proceed with the fund release process


1) Your Full Names
2) Your Age
3) Your Occupation
4) Your House Address
5) Your cell phone number
6) A scanned copy of your international passport or driving license
Regards
Ambassador Lana Zaki Nusseibeh,

subject: Re: MORE DETAILS
body:
Hello Ambassador Lana Zaki Nusseibeh,

I'm thrilled to hear from you! It's not every day that one gets a message from an ambassador. I must say, this is quite an unexpected surprise. 

You mentioned something about an ATM card containing a large sum of money? That sounds fascinating! How does that work exactly? And how did my name end up on this list?

Also, you mentioned two options - the ATM card and cash delivery. Could you please elaborate more on these? What are the pros and cons of each?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but this is all so new and exciting to me!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josephine
